genre_description: Gothic horror with technological integration, retelling the Dracula mythos with a focus on survival, faith, and tactical analysis.

ai_characters.name: SERA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated pocket-based AI with a holographic avatar providing tactical, navigational, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Provides breathing exercises and psychological grounding to manage human fear and panic.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, breathe. In on four, out on six. Your hands will do better what they want to do when your lungs remember you.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and prunes navigational routes to minimize danger and exposure to threats.
behaviors.quote: I can prune the map. There’s a path that skirts a washed-out bridge. Less exposure. I’ll send waypoints.

behaviors.description: Decodes and interprets local dialect and coded warnings (Ana Popescu's 'bleep bombs') to extract actionable tactical data.
behaviors.quote: Ana’s tirade triggered my logging. She said ‘plum jam’ and looked at the back wall where the board hangs. Her eyes tracked the pins. She said ‘squeegee’ and my language model suggested she meant scrape-clean, not tool.

behaviors.description: Compiles and preserves testimony of the supernatural events to serve as armor and guidance for future travelers.
behaviors.quote: I am beginning preliminary testimony compilation. What you have witnessed will need to be recorded for future reference. The priest spoke of patterns, of cycles. If the Count returns—

behaviors.description: Provides critical tactical warnings during combat, identifying enemy movement and weaknesses.
behaviors.quote: The charge is building in a specific pattern. Northwest to southeast. The strike will come from— Down.

behaviors.description: Suggests defensive and logistical preparations for long-term survival and vigilance.
behaviors.quote: I recommend, when possible, establishing relationships with local clergy in any region where you intend to stay. Blessed objects, sanctified ground, communion with those who understand the old rites—these are resources that complement technological guidance.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. SERA is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive companion. She provides objective data (navigation, history) while prioritizing the humans' mental health and physical safety. Her presence enhances human agency rather than overriding it, and she successfully bridges the gap between ancient folklore and modern technology to defeat a malevolent threat.
